sentences.en: Since the 1990s, artists from beyond the Euro-American area have rivalled the western art system.
sentences.cn: 自从上个世纪90年代，欧美地区外的艺术家开始赶超西方艺术系统体系。

sentences.en: Contain Euro-American style series, chenille series, Jacquard series, Plain printing and dyeing series.
sentences.cn: 有欧美风格系列、雪尼尔绒类系列、色织提花系列、素色印花系列。

sentences.en: The reasons for the exceptional degree of Euro-American vigilance and interference in the Arab world are plain.
sentences.cn: 欧美对阿拉伯世界的异常的警戒和干涉程度，原因很简单。
